SELECT seq_task.nextval FROM dual
insert into task (tsk_no, order_no, tsk_ttl, tsk_stat_cd, pre_st_dt, pre_end_dt, prg, use_yn, prj_no, st_dt, end_dt, weight_val, rel_out_nm, par_task_no, ante_task_no, sys_no, reg_id, reg_dt) values (#{tsk_no}, #{order_no}, #{tsk_ttl}, #{tsk_stat_cd}, TO_DATE(#{pre_st_dt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{pre_end_dt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{prg}, 'Y', #{prj_no}, TO_DATE(#{st_dt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{end_dt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{weight_val}, #{rel_out_nm}, #{par_task_no}, #{ante_task_no}, #{sys_no}, #{reg_id}, SYSDATE)
insert into taskmember (mem_no, tm_no, prj_no, tsk_no) values (#{memNo}, #{tmNo}, #{prj_no}, #{tsk_no})
mapper.select: SELECT tsk_no, par_task_no, tsk_ttl FROM task WHERE prj_no = #{prj_no} START WITH tsk_no = #{tsk_no} CONNECT BY PRIOR par_task_no = tsk_no ORDER BY SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(par_task_no, '/') DESC
SELECT MAX(order_no) FROM task WHERE par_task_no = #{parentNo}
SELECT tsk_no AS wbsNo, tsk_ttl AS wbsName, par_task_no AS parentNo, order_no AS orderNo FROM task WHERE tsk_no = #{wbsNo}
SELECT tsk_no AS wbsNo, tsk_ttl AS wbsName, par_task_no AS parentNo, order_no AS orderNo FROM task WHERE par_task_no = #{parentNo} ORDER BY order_no ASC
select o.opt_no as optNo, o.opt_ttl as optTitle from taskoutput t join output o on t.folder_no = o.opt_no where t.task_no = #{tsk_no}
